properties.Name: HrEventType
properties.Description:
A type of employment event based on common characteristics, functions or objectives.

Ex:

BEHAVIORAL COUNSELING
 An activity or HR/employee interaction dealing with counseling for behavior.
 
DRUG TEST
 The testing of an employee or prospect to determine if they are involved in drug use.
 
EXIT INTERVIEW
 An interview or HR/employee interaction dealing with the voluntary termination of employment.
 
INTERNAL POSITION INTERVIEW
 An interview or HR/employee interaction dealing with application for an internal position with the employer.
 
LAYOFF The employee is laid off.
 
NEW HIRE
 The hiring of a new employee.
 
PERFORMANCE REVIEW
 An interview with an employee to inform them of their Performance Evaluation or Review.

PROBATION
 The period during which the employer decides whether the employee meets certain minimum requirements of performance. 
 
REFERENCE CHECK
 A reference check of a prospective employee's employment-related information.
 
REHIRED FULL-TIME
 The employee is rehired full-time after already having been an employee.
 
RE-HIRED PART-TIME
 The employee is rehired part-time after already having been a full-time employee.
 
RETIREMENT The employee retires.
 
RETURN FROM DISABILITY LEAVE
 The employee returns from disability leave.
 
RETURN FROM LAYOFF TO ACTIVE FULL-TIME
 The employee is returned to full-time status after an involuntary layoff.
 
RETURN FROM LAYOFF TO ACTIVE PART-TIME
 The employee is returning to part-time employment after a layoff.
 
RETURN FROM MEDICAL LEAVE OF ABSENCE
 The employee returns from a medical leave of absence.
 
RETURN FROM PERSONAL LEAVE OF ABSENCE
 The employees returns from a personal leave of absence taken by the employee.
 
RETURN FROM SABBATICAL
 The return from a paid leave provided by the employer.
 
START DISABILITY LEAVE
 The employee is placed on disability leave of absence.
 
START MEDICAL LEAVE OF ABSENCE
 The employee starts a medical leave of absence.
 
START PERSONAL LEAVE OF ABSENCE
 The employees starts a personal leave of absence taken by the employee.
 
START SABBATICAL 
 The start of a paid leave provided by the employer.
 
SUBSTANCE ABUSE COUNSELING
 An activity or HR/employee interaction dealing with substance abuse behavior.
 
TERMINATION The employee is terminated by the employer.
 
TRANSFER TO PART-TIME STATUS
 The employee transfers to a part-time position or part-time status.
 
VOLUNTARY TERMINATION
 The employee voluntarily terminates employment.

Columns.Name: HrEventTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an HR Event Type.

Columns.Name: HrEventTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of an HR Event Type.

Columns.Name: HrEventTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of an HR Event Type.

Columns.Name: HrEventCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an HR Event Category ID
